page.title: 11Home Life My Family Leanne
page.content: {Leanne.} Four people live in our house. There's Mummy,Daddy,Simon and me.Simon is eighteen months old. Simon and I play chasing each other on the bikes and we have great fun. Sometimes Simon falls down and I have to pick him up. I made a bird table and Simon eats the bread that I put on the bird table. I say,"No, do not eat that you little menace.Its for the birds." Then Mummy comes out and says,"You would think that he had not seen food in years." And I say,"Yes, its a fact." Simon sometimes doesn't eat it.He leaves it on the ground and the dog gets it.
